column1: Hi We're the Pop-Bots
We're here to introduce ourselves
We are here to help you with stress
Sounds good
Yes
Awesome
May we have your name please
Not right now
Nice to meet you We hope we can help you when you need us
Just say hi when you want to talk to us
Hi
how are you
Checkin changed the chat colours
Pop set his own nickname to Sir Laughs
Hi I'm Sir Laughs Bot
I'm here to help you deal with your stress
Could you share something that's on your mind that is stressing you out
So much work
Ok tell me more detail about this situation
There's school work and managing myself
Thank you for sharing
That does sound stressful
Ok let's try looking at this situation in a different light
I want you to take a few minutes to come up with a joke about this situation
Would you like an example
Yes please
For example if you are hungry and you are stuck in traffic
This might be a good joke
Why do French people eat snails
Because they don't like fast food
Don't worry about it being the best joke just find something humorous about your situation
Can you please tell me your joke
I really cant joke about this right now it is quite stressful
Good joke
Sometimes there are good things that happen even if the situation isn't the best
Ohh
Did that help you to find something good (or at least funny) about the situation
Perhaps
I'm glad Would you consider trying this strategy such as finding a joke in the future
I'm not sure
Do you think Sir Laughs Bot helps you to reduce stress Almost no help neutral or very helpful
Neutral
Thank you for sharing with me I hope I've been able to help
Have a nice day
Thanks
Restart
Hi
Sir Laughs changed the chat colours
Pop set his own nickname to Treat yourself
Hi I'm Treat yourself Bot
I'm here to help you deal with your stress
What's on your mind that is stressing you out
Perhaps I dont like the food I'm eating
Oh sorry to hear that Could you give me more information about dont
It's just not what I want right now
Imagine a close friend came to you with a similar problem
How would you support them
Tell them to order whatever they want
What do you think are the benefits of offering this kind of support
You're taking charge of the situation
Do you have a friend you could go to for this type of support
Sure
Could you make a plan of when to connect with this person
Could you help with that
Awesome friends can often provide the best support
It's great that you have made time to prioritize yourself
Thanks
Do you think Treat yourself Bot helps you to reduce stress Almost no help neutral or very helpful
Helpful
Thank you for sharing with me I hope I've been able to help
Have a nice day
You too
Hi
Treat yourself changed the chat colours
Pop set his own nickname to Checkin
Hi I'm Checkin Bot
I'm here to help you deal with your stress
Can you tell me about a recent situation that is stressing you out
